title: The Way of the Wok
description: A foundational technique for achieving 'wok hei' - the breath of the wok. This is less a recipe and more a philosophy of heat, speed, and flavor.
instructions: Ensure your wok is screaming hot before adding oil.
Sear the beef quickly, removing it before it is fully cooked.
Stir-fry the broccoli and garlic until vibrant.
Return the beef to the wok, add sauces, and toss to combine.
Serve immediately. The wok does not wait.

title: The Patient Pan-Seared Salmon
description: Patience is the key to perfectly crispy skin. This technique teaches control and observation, resulting in a flawless piece of fish.
